stream.text: Whether to stream the response or not, if stream the responses will be sent as data-only server-sent events as they become available, with the stream terminated by a status: 'finish' message. Example Python code.

lang.text: Defaults to en. The language to use for the prompt

external_id.text: The external ID of the prompt history.

custom_persona.text: Custom persona to use for the conversation

chatbot_model.text: Chatbot model to use for the conversation

response_source.text: Defaults to default. By default, we ask ChatGPT to use only your content in its response (recommended). If you wish ChatGPT to improvise and use its own knowledgebase as well, you can set this to 'openai_content'.

meta.description: Retrieve the project settings for a specific project

project_id.text: The unique identifier of a project

chat_bot_avatar.text: This is the avatar that is shown in the bot response. You can make it a profile picture or your company logo.

chat_bot_bg.text: This is the background image shown in the bot conversations widget. You can change it to a company logo or background image.

default_prompt.text: This is the default prompt shown to the user. You can customize this for your company or client.

example_questions.text: These are example questions shown to guide the bot users. You can create customized questions to suit your company or client needs.

response_source.text: By default, we ask ChatGPT to use only your content in its response (recommended). If you wish ChatGPT to improvise and use its own knowledgebase as well, you can select 'My Content + ChatGPT'

chatbot_msg_lang.text: By default, the chatbot messages like 'Ask Me Anything' are in English. You can customize this to your preferred language. Please note: This setting does not control what language ChatGPT responds in. That is controlled by the user's question. So a user asking in Portuguese, will most likely get a response from ChatGPT in Portuguese.

chatbot_color.text: Color of the chatbot in hex format

chatbot_toolbar_color.text: Color of the chatbot toolbar in hex format

persona_instructions.text: Customize your chatbot behavior by adjusting the system parameter to control its personality traits and role.

citations_answer_source_label_msg.text: This is the message shown to indicate where the response came from. You can customize this message based on your business or language.

citations_sources_label_msg.text: This is the message shown for the Sources label. You can customize this message based on your business or language.

hang_in_there_msg.text: This is the message shown when the bot is thinking and waiting to answer. You can customize this message based on your tone, personality or language.

chatbot_siesta_msg.text: This is the message shown when the bot has encountered a problem or error. You can customize this message based on your tone, personality or language.

is_loading_indicator_enabled.text: Defaults to true. Show animated loading indicator while waiting for a response from the chatbot.

enable_citations.text: Defaults to true. Each chatbot response shows an option for the user to see the sources/citations from your content from which the response was generated.

citations_view_type.text: Defaults to user. Control how citations are shown. By default, the user can initiate to see the citations. You can choose to have it 'Auto Shown' or 'Auto Hide'

no_answer_message.text: This is the message shown when the bot cannot answer. You can customize it to a message asking the user to contact customer support or leave their email / phone.

ending_message.text: You can instruct ChatGPT to end every response with some text like asking 'Please email us for further support' (Not recommended for most use cases)

remove_branding.text: Controls what branding is shown at the bottom of the chatbot.

enable_recaptcha_for_public_chatbots.text: Should we check messages from guests with Recaptcha when your chatbot is publicly available (i.e. shared or embedded).

chatbot_model.text: This is the model used by the chatbot. You can choose a different model to suit your needs.

is_selling_enabled.text: Enable selling of chatbot for monetization
